project

Class Reservation

  • java.lang.Object
    • project.Reservation

  • public class Reservation
extends java.lang.Object
    Reservation is the class where the each reservation is made, it consists of various get and set methods which are used to instantiate and grab values and variables the reservation objects
    Author:
    Brian Archbold

    • Constructor Detail

      • Reservation

        public Reservation()
        Default Constructor Used to construct/shell a reservation for the resident

      • Reservation

        public Reservation(int aNumber,
                   java.lang.String aName,
                   java.lang.String aPurchaseType,
                   java.lang.String aCheckIn,
                   int aNightsStaying,
                   int aNumberOfRooms,
                   java.util.ArrayList<Room> aRooms,
                   double aTotal,
                   double aDeposit,
                   boolean aCancel,
                   boolean aProcessed)
        Constructor containing arguments This constructor takes in arguments These arguments are then assigned to their variables, respectively
        Parameters:
        aNumber - The residence reservation number.
        aName - The full name of the resident
        aPurchaseType - The purchase type that the resident used to book his/her room
        aCheckIn - The date at which they will be checking in.
        aNightsStaying - The number of nights the residents will be staying at the hotel
        aNumberOfRooms - The number of rooms the resident has booked at the hotel
        aRooms - Contents concerning each room the resident has booked, includes the type of room, occupancy and choice of breakfast
        aTotal - The sum of money the resident owes during his stay.
        aDeposit - The deposit the resident has paid, only applies to Standard Bookings
        aCancel - Whether or not the resident has cancelled or not
        aProcessed - Whether or not the resident has been processed

        public boolean getProcessed()
        Gets whether the residence has been processed, (ie. checkedIn or cancelled)their reservation or not

        processed true or false depending if resident has been processed
